text: @PressSec Inb4 “don’t make his death a political joke by claiming he contracted COVID-19 a week after attending the Tulsa shitsh— err, rally, by taking pictures with many people while not wearing a mask. The mask probably is what caused his COVID-19, just like it gave it to Louie Gohmert.”
